    index="test",
    settings={
        "index": {
            "number_of_shards": 1,
            "analysis": {
                "analyzer": {
                    "trigram": {
                        "type": "custom",
                        "tokenizer": "standard",
                        "filter": [
                            "lowercase",
                            "shingle"
                        ]
                    },
                    "reverse": {
                        "type": "custom",
                        "tokenizer": "standard",
                        "filter": [
                            "lowercase",
                            "reverse"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "filter": {
                    "shingle": {
                        "type": "shingle",
                        "min_shingle_size": 2,
                        "max_shingle_size": 3
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "title": {
                "type": "text",
                "fields": {
                    "trigram": {
                        "type": "text",
                        "analyzer": "trigram"
                    },
                    "reverse": {
                        "type": "text",
                        "analyzer": "reverse"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
